short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Jira oriented persons more at home when using ClickUp

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key features:

* Make ClickUp columns fit in one viewport without horizontal scrolling.
* Add an avatars row to to enable fast switches between assignees 
  (mutli select is possible without extra server requests)
* Remove unnecessary wide gaps.
* Remove unnecessary column coloring.
* Override tickets colors with sane 3 colors (story - green, bug - red, other - blue)
* Add a button to switch between `all page scrolling` or `column base scrolling`.
* Add a button to easily switch between light & dark theme.
